channel.title: Textiles on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Textiles on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Fabindia Logo
Fabindia is an Indian chain store retailing garments, furnishings, fabrics and ethnic products handmade by craftspeople across rural India. Established in 1960 by John Bissell, an American working for the Ford Foundation, New Delhi, Fabindia started out exporting home furnishings, before stepping into domestic retail in 1976, when it opened its first retail store in Greater Kailash, New Delhi. The chairman of the company is John’s son, William Nanda Bissell.
You can download theFabindialogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Fabindia
item.description: Fabindia is an Indian chain store retailing garments, furnishings, fabrics and ethnic products handmade by craftspeople across rural India. Established in 1960 by John Bissell, an American working for the Ford Foundation, New Delhi, Fabindia started out exporting home furnishings, before stepping into domestic retail in 1976, when it opened its first retail store in Greater Kailash, New Delhi. The chairman of the company is John’s son, William Nanda Bissell.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
River Island Logo River Island is a London-headquartered high street fashion brand, which operates in a number of worldwide markets. Set up in 1948, by Bernard Lewis and his brothers in London. River Island is a private company owned by the Lewis family. Source
You can download theRiver Islandlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: River Island
item.description: River Island is a London-headquartered high street fashion brand, which operates in a number of worldwide markets. Set up in 1948, by Bernard Lewis and his brothers in London. River Island is a private company owned by the Lewis family. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Zara Home Logo Zara Home is a company that belongs to the Spanish Inditex group dedicated to the manufacturing of home textiles. It was created in 2003. It has around 408 stores in 44 countries. The company focuses on retailing various housewares. The headquarters of Zara Home is located in A Coruña, Spain. Source
You can download theZara Homelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Zara Home
item.description: Zara Home is a company that belongs to the Spanish Inditex group dedicated to the manufacturing of home textiles. It was created in 2003. It has around 408 stores in 44 countries. The company focuses on retailing various housewares. The headquarters of Zara Home is located in A Coruña, Spain. Source
